00036 def Twitter_Log():
00037     file = open('API_twitter.keys', 'r+')
00038     data = json.load(file)
00039     consumer_key="2YIdiuX1g8GyCGu0bkl2w"
00040     consumer_secret="NQm7aC0R7yYNyIgIGp9YkVl5whgqLr7yhNM7n13sCso"
00041 
00042     auth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
00043 
00044     if data.get('ACCESS_TOKEN'):
00045         auth.set_access_token(data["ACCESS_TOKEN"], data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"])
00046     file.close()
00047     api = tweepy.API(auth) 
00048     return api

00050 def GetTime(date):
00051     Time = {}
00052     Time['year'] = date.year
00053     Time['month'] = date.month
00054     Time['day'] = date.day
00055     Time['hour'] = date.hour
00056     Time['minute'] = date.minute
00057     Time['second']= date.second
00058     Time['weekday'] = date.weekday()
00059     return Time

00062 def Favorite(api, tweet_id):
00063     text = api.create_favorite(tweet_id)
00064     return text
00065 
00066 def HomeTimeline(api):
00067     public_tweets = api.home_timeline(count=100)
00068     Posts = []
00069     for tweet in public_tweets:
00070         Post = {}
00071         t_user = tweet.user
00072 
00073         Post['user_name'] = t_user.screen_name
00074         Post['id'] = tweet.id_str
00075         Post['content'] = tweet.text
00076         Time = GetTime(tweet.created_at)
00077         Post['time'] = Time
00078         Posts.append(Post)
00079     return Posts
00080 
00081 def UserTimeline(api, name):
00082     public_tweets = api.user_timeline(screen_name=name,count=100)
00083     Posts = []
00084     for tweet in public_tweets:
00085         Post = {}
00086         t_user = tweet.author
00087         Post['user_name'] = t_user.screen_name
00088         Post['id'] = tweet.id_str
00089         Post['content'] = tweet.text
00090         Time = GetTime(tweet.created_at)
00091         Post['time'] = Time
00092         Posts.append(Post)
00093     return Posts
00094 
00095 def Reply(api, tweet_id, text):
00096     user = api.get_status(tweet_id)
00097     content = '@' + user.author.screen_name + ': '+ unicode(text,'utf8')  
00098     public_tweets = api.update_status(status=content, in_reply_to_status_id=tweet_id)
00099 
00100 def Query(api, request):
00101     public_tweets = api.search(request,{})
00102     Posts = []
00103     for tweet in public_tweets:
00104         Post = {}
00105         t_user = tweet.from_user
00106 
00107         Post['user_name'] = t_user
00108         Post['id'] = tweet.id_str
00109         Post['content'] = tweet.text
00110         Time = GetTime(tweet.created_at)
00111         Post['time'] = Time
00112         Posts.append(Post)
00113     return Posts

00116 def QueryMyTimeline(api, request):
00117     request = unicode(request, "utf-8")
00118     Posts = HomeTimeline(api)
00119     print len(Posts)
00120     new_Posts = []
00121     for p in Posts:
00122         if request in p['content']:
00123             new_Posts.append(p)
00124 
00125     return new_Posts

00131     print len(Posts)
00132     new_Posts = []
00133     for p in Posts:
00134         if request in p['content']:
00135             new_Posts.append(p)
00136

00139 def GetFriends(api):
00140     friends = api.friends()
00141     file_friend = open('FriendsList','w')
00142     for f in friends:
00143         file_friend.write(f.screen_name + '\n')
00144     file_friend.close()

00179         i = 2
00180         if cmp(sys.argv[1], 'query') == 0:
00181             my = False
00182             while i < argc:
00183                 if sys.argv[i] == '-r':
00184                     i = i + 1
00185                     request = sys.argv[i]
00186                 elif sys.argv[i] == '-u':
00187                     i = i + 1
00188                     user = sys.argv[i]
00189                 elif sys.argv[i] == '-m':
00190                     my = True
00191                 i = i + 1
00192                 
00193             if 'request' in locals() and 'user' in locals():
00194                 Posts = QueryUserTimeline(api, user, request)
00195             elif 'user' in locals():
00196                 Posts = UserTimeline(api, user)
00197             elif 'request' in locals() and my:
00198                 Posts = QueryMyTimeline(api, request)
00199             elif 'request' in locals() and not my:
00200                 Posts = Query(api, request)
00201

00204             file2.write(output)
00205             file2.close()
